department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: The objective of the current course is to advance course attendants’ understanding of personnel recruitment and selection. This course is designed to help executive students to learn important recruitment and selection theories and realize the practices. The major course challenge will be integrating what you have known about HR in the past and can apply HR theory and recent research findings to diagnose and solve practical problems and challenges.

4.        Recruitment Source

7.        Digital recruiting ＆ Social media
8.        IVEY Case Discussion
9.        Reliability and Validity (I)
10.      Reliability and Validity (II): Application of HR analytics
11.      Biodata
12.      Personality test
13.      Selection Interview
14.      Applicant Reaction

17/18  Final Exams ＆ Final Report
